name: Myth F People Quiz | Mythology Mixture | 10 Questions

questions.text: I am the Goddess of Fever. Romans prayed to me at the shrine on Palatine Hill. Who am I?
I was the shepherd who sheltered Remus and Romulus after finding them being suckled by a She-wolf. Who am I?
We are the demons of the Underworld, generally associated with the Greek Erinyes. Who are we?
I am the god of destiny. My word constitutes the irrevocable decision of things to come. Who am I?
I am the son of Janus, and a minor god associated with fountains, wells, and springs. Who am I?
I am the goddess of the oven and bread making. Who am I?
I am the goddess often known as Tyche, the chance personification. Who am I?
I am the male principle of chance, generally found with Fortuna. Who am I?
I am the entity associated with hunger, nibbling at everything in sight. Who am I?
I am the goddess of vegetative power often associated with Chloris, a Greek nymph. I can even make a flower, so that if you touch it, you will instantly become pregnant. Who am I?
